mapper.sql: id, zone, dns_server_id, status, register_date, due_date, remark, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag
mapper.select:
select
from erm_dns_private_zone where zone = #{zone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1

update erm_dns_private_zone
zone = #{zone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dns_server_id = #{dnsServerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
register_date = #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update erm_dns_private_zone set zone = #{zone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dns_server_id = #{dnsServerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_date = #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, due_date = #{dueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from erm_dns_private_zone where del_flag!=1
AND `zone` LIKE CONCAT('%','${zone}','%')
